deleteSub: This will permanently delete this item. This action cannot be undone.
name: Name
changesNotSaved: Changes are not saved until you click Save below.
notificationSub: Tap a notification to mark it as read.

classes.title: Classes
classes.sub: Upcoming and past classes offered by the center.
classes.createSub: Create a one-time class or a multi-part series.
classes.deleteSub: This permanently deletes the series and all parts.

library.title: Library
library.sub: Books and equipment available for checking out at the center.
library.createSub: Add a book or piece of equipment to inventory.
library.updateSub: Update details about a book or piece of equipment to inventory.
library.deleteSub: This permanently deletes the item and all copies.

training.sub: Each course will earn a certificate. If additional lessons are added to a course, you'll need to update to keep your certification current.

resource.title: Resource/Activity
resource.sub: Active resources and activites at the BFSC
resource.readSub: If you would like to edit or delete this resource, buttons can be found below.
resource.updateSub: Modify any details below and make sure to hit save when you're done.
resource.createSub: Fill out this form to create a resource or activity.

reservation.title: Reservation
reservation.requestSub: This will request will appear under your name in the system.  If you are a worker, make sure to put the patron's name in the notes.
reservation.requestSuccessSub: Your request has been received and will be reviewed shortly.
reservation.appointmentDisclaimer: Note: The time block you selected is outside of normal operating hours and is offered by appointment only. Upon submission, a shift leader will contact you shortly to confirm and make arrangements. Submitting this form does not guarantee availability.
reservation.full: I might need help the whole time
reservation.phoneHelp: Weâ€™ll use this number to confirm your appointment.

center.definitionSub: Set the main details of your center. You shouldn't need to change these very often other than initial setup.
center.announcementSub: Make announcements to patrons, workers, shift leads etc.
center.announcementCreateSub: Create an announcment for patrons, workers etc.
center.announcementEditSub: To make edits, go back and click the edit button.
center.announcementUpdateSub: Changes are not saved until you click Save below.

projects.title: Project
projects.sub: Community projects where a few volunteers make all the difference.
projects.instructionsPlaceholder: Describe any specifics on how a volunteers can contribute to the project. Include links to spreadsheets, videos etc.
projects.specificPlaceholder: What needs to be accomplished? Who is responsible? What steps are needed?
projects.measurablePlaceholder: Measurable goals include specific criteria for tracking progress and success.
projects.achievablePlaceholder: The goal should be challenging but attainable within your capabilities and resources. It's important to ensure the goal is within reach to maintain motivation.
projects.relevantPlaceholder: A relevant goal aligns with your broader objectives and is important to your overall purpose.
projects.timelyPlaceholder: A time-bound goal has a clearly defined deadline, which creates a sense of urgency and prevents procrastination. It should include both a start and a target completion date.
projects.checkpointsSub: Make edits to the checkpoints of this project.

author: Author
copyCodesSub: One per line. Each code must be a unique id for your library.
atLeast1CopyCode: At least one copy code is required.
